short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces D&D Beyond's digital dices with links to TaleSpire

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It currently requires digital dice to be enabled on DNDBeyond.

In addition it also does the following:
- Right-click dice buttons to roll with Advantage or Disadvantage.
- Adds dice rolls to descriptions with support for replacing "your Dexterity modifier" with the proper value.
- Adds dice rolls to extra creatures in the character sheet
- Adds dice rolls to monster pages
- Hold alt/ctrl/shift while clicking the button to roll double dice for ADV/DIS rolls. This can be changed within the options.
 - Adds off-hand attack to light weapons when character has Two-Weapon Fighting.
 - Fix the dice used on Chaos Bolt.
 - Adds separate darts for Magic Missile.
 - Adds two meteor option for Melf's Minute Meteors.
 - Adds separate rays for Scorching Ray.
 - Adds a separate entry for damaged rolls with Toll the Dead.

Please use the github issue tracker to report any bugs or suggest features: https://github.com/haste/tales-beyond/issues
